name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fresh Finder - Hide old eBay items

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See original upload date and hide by age.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fresh Finder lets you hide old and re-listed eBay items.

You will see the actual age of listings and find fresh-to-eBay treasures!

UPDATE: Now shows how many days a sold listing took to sell.

---

I will add updates as long as eBay is compatible with Fresh Finder.

If you have any questions or concerns, please reach out.

Happy Hunting!
